segment.source: Create your community in Orvium and start managing your conference, journal or scientific repository in a few minutes.
segment.target: Create your community in Orvium and start managing your conference, journal or scientific repository in a few minutes.

segment.source: Orvium is an open platform in which everyone is invited to collaborate.
segment.target: Orvium is an open platform in which everyone is invited to collaborate.

segment.source: Discover about what matters to you
segment.target: Discover about what matters to you

segment.source: We couldn't find Metamask extension installed in your browser. Please, install the extension and try again. If you have any questions please feel free to check our user guide or contact us through the feedback button bellow.
segment.target: We couldn't find Metamask extension installed in your browser. Please, install the extension and try again. If you have any questions please feel free to check our user guide or contact us through the feedback button bellow.

segment.source: The publication is ready to be published
segment.target: The publication is ready to be published

segment.source: The publication needs some small changes to be published
segment.target: The publication needs some small changes to be published

segment.source: The publication contains errors that must be corrected
segment.target: The publication contains errors that must be corrected

segment.source: A global community of researchers like you
segment.target: A global community of researchers like you

segment.source: Edit and manage the information displayed about your community
segment.target: Edit and manage the information displayed about your community

segment.source: Please, put a valid ISSN code
segment.target: Please, put a valid ISSN code

segment.source: You must select at least one license!
segment.target: You must select at least one license!

segment.source: Choose the file extensions allowed for the submission of articles.
segment.target: Choose the file extensions allowed for the submission of articles.

segment.source: Following options allow moderators to define who can create peer reviews
segment.target: Following options allow moderators to define who can create peer reviews

segment.source: Everyone can create a peer review
segment.target: Everyone can create a peer review

segment.source: Only invited reviewers can create peer reviews
segment.target: Only invited reviewers can create peer reviews

segment.source: Following options will allow you to define the author's permissions when inviting reviewers to their publications
segment.target: Following options will allow you to define the author's permissions when inviting reviewers to their publications

segment.source: Following options allows you to select which users will see the identity of the reviewers
segment.target: Following options allows you to select which users will see the identity of the reviewers

segment.source: Following options allows you to select which users will see the review
segment.target: Following options allows you to select which users will see the review

segment.source: Show review to the publication author
segment.target: Show review to the publication author

segment.source: Press Save to preview your changes.
segment.target: Press Save to preview your changes.

segment.source: Add relevant dates for your community and keep everyone updated, ie: Call for Papers deadlines, Conference dates, etc.
segment.target: Add relevant dates for your community and keep everyone updated, ie: Call for Papers deadlines, Conference dates, etc.

segment.source: The switch below will show or hide a "Calendar" button on your community landing page. If no dates are entered, the button won't be displayed.
segment.target: The switch below will show or hide a "Calendar" button on your community landing page. If no dates are entered, the button won't be displayed.

segment.source: This community will be submitted and reviewed by Orvium. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: This community will be submitted and reviewed by Orvium. Do you want to continue?

segment.source: This community has no active calls for now.
segment.target: This community has no active calls for now.

segment.source: Following the official community's guidelines, authors will have to acknowledge when submitting a new publication:
segment.target: Following the official community's guidelines, authors will have to acknowledge when submitting a new publication:

segment.source: If you want to know more, please watch our explainer video here.
segment.target: If you want to know more, please watch our explainer video here.

segment.source: Please complete the following form to submit your work. Before clicking the "Submit" button, please ensure your submission is ready as you will not be able to make any further changes. If you have any questions or concerns, please refer to our user guide for assistance.
segment.target: Please complete the following form to submit your work. Before clicking the "Submit" button, please ensure your submission is ready as you will not be able to make any further changes. If you have any questions or concerns, please refer to our user guide for assistance.

segment.source: Remember to press the submit button when you finish your article to send it to the community editorial board.
segment.target: Remember to press the submit button when you finish your article to send it to the community editorial board.

segment.source: This article state does not allow changes.
segment.target: This article state does not allow changes.

segment.source: You have to choose a license type
segment.target: You have to choose a license type

segment.source: You need to accept iThenticate EULA before using this feature.
segment.target: You need to accept iThenticate EULA before using this feature.

segment.source: File extension is not supported by iThenticate. Accepted extensions are: docx, doc, xml, pdf, tex, html, rtf and wpd.
segment.target: File extension is not supported by iThenticate. Accepted extensions are: docx, doc, xml, pdf, tex, html, rtf and wpd.

segment.source: File is being processed. Please click Refresh if it does not update automatically.
segment.target: File is being processed. Please click Refresh if it does not update automatically.

segment.source: There was an error processing the file. Error code: . Please contact Orvium.
segment.target: There was an error processing the file. Error code: . Please contact Orvium.

segment.source: Similarity Report is being processed. Please click Refresh if it does not update automatically.
segment.target: Similarity Report is being processed. Please click Refresh if it does not update automatically.

segment.source: This article state does not allow changes.
segment.target: This article state does not allow changes.

segment.source: No authors have been added yet.
segment.target: No authors have been added yet.

segment.source: Entering a valid ORCID will try to populate missing fields
segment.target: Entering a valid ORCID will try to populate missing fields

segment.source: ORCID has to be like this: https://orcid.org/0000-0000-0000-0000
segment.target: ORCID has to be like this: https://orcid.org/0000-0000-0000-0000

segment.source: The following options will allow you to define the author's permissions when inviting reviewers to their publications
segment.target: The following options will allow you to define the author's permissions when inviting reviewers to their publications

segment.source: No references have been added yet.
segment.target: No references have been added yet.

segment.source: To edit a reference click on the one you want to modify and scroll down until you reach the text area where you can add your changes. Finally click the "Save Reference" button.
segment.target: To edit a reference click on the one you want to modify and scroll down until you reach the text area where you can add your changes. Finally click the "Save Reference" button.

segment.source: This link doesn't have a proper format
segment.target: This link doesn't have a proper format

segment.source: No references have been added yet,
segment.target: No references have been added yet,

segment.source: To edit a reference click on the one you want to modify and scroll down until you reach the text area where you can add your changes. Finally click the "Save Reference" button. Once you have all your references click the "Save publication references" button.
segment.target: To edit a reference click on the one you want to modify and scroll down until you reach the text area where you can add your changes. Finally click the "Save Reference" button. Once you have all your references click the "Save publication references" button.

segment.source: This article cannot be edit. You may not upload new files but you can download the existing ones.
segment.target: This article cannot be edit. You may not upload new files but you can download the existing ones.

segment.source: This is not a valid ISSN format
segment.target: This is not a valid ISSN format

segment.source: This is not a valid format, positive number expected
segment.target: This is not a valid format, positive number expected

segment.source: This is not a valid language format
segment.target: This is not a valid language format

segment.source: Optional settings to link github repositories
segment.target: Optional settings to link github repositories

segment.source: Turn a GitHub repo into a collection of interactive notebooks. Orvium uses Binder to open those notebooks in an executable environment, making your code immediately reproducible by anyone, anywhere.
segment.target: Turn a GitHub repo into a collection of interactive notebooks. Orvium uses Binder to open those notebooks in an executable environment, making your code immediately reproducible by anyone, anywhere.

segment.source: You can edit the preview of your publication directly here, the changes will reflect immediately after saving, and if a new publication file is uploaded this content will be refreshed.
segment.target: You can edit the preview of your publication directly here, the changes will reflect immediately after saving, and if a new publication file is uploaded this content will be refreshed.

segment.source: Optional settings for this publication in the Blochchain
segment.target: Optional settings for this publication in the Blochchain

segment.source: Use the blockchain to access extra features such as proving of the ownership of your work and get rewards for the peer reviews you make.
segment.target: Use the blockchain to access extra features such as proving of the ownership of your work and get rewards for the peer reviews you make.

segment.source: Save the Ownership of your publication storing your authorship in the blockchain
segment.target: Save the Ownership of your publication storing your authorship in the blockchain

segment.source: Unlock and deposit your ORVs, so reviewers can see how much you're willing to reward:
segment.target: Unlock and deposit your ORVs, so reviewers can see how much you're willing to reward:

segment.source: You have ORVs unlocked and ready for deposit.
segment.target: You have ORVs unlocked and ready for deposit.

segment.source: The author has deposited i18n ORV tokens for peer review rewards.
segment.target: The author has deposited i18n ORV tokens for peer review rewards.

segment.source: Please read and acknowledge the following requirements before submitting:
segment.target: Please read and acknowledge the following requirements before submitting:

segment.source: If you are not sure about this action, you can read more details at here.
segment.target: If you are not sure about this action, you can read more details at here.

segment.source: When you confirm this transaction, the Orvium smart contract will take ORV tokens from your wallet executing the ERC20 method "transferFrom".
segment.target: When you confirm this transaction, the Orvium smart contract will take ORV tokens from your wallet executing the ERC20 method "transferFrom".

segment.source: Preview automatically generated form the publication file.
segment.target: Preview automatically generated form the publication file.

segment.source: No reviews to show. Please remember to LOG IN as some reviews may be only visible to specific users.
segment.target: No reviews to show. Please remember to LOG IN as some reviews may be only visible to specific users.

segment.source: * You have been invited to review this publication. Go to My Reviews to manage the invitation.
segment.target: * You have been invited to review this publication. Go to My Reviews to manage the invitation.

segment.source: You can learn more about how to create a new publication
segment.target: You can learn more about how to create a new publication

segment.source: Or if you prefer, you can see the full process in the following video.
segment.target: Or if you prefer, you can see the full process in the following video.

segment.source: From here you will have access to the status of all your invitations. It is important to remember to promptly accept or reject each invitation in order to effectively communicate your decision to the requester.
segment.target: From here you will have access to the status of all your invitations. It is important to remember to promptly accept or reject each invitation in order to effectively communicate your decision to the requester.

segment.source: has not uploaded any publication yet
segment.target: has not uploaded any publication yet

segment.source: has not reviewed any publication yet
segment.target: has not reviewed any publication yet

segment.source: From here you will have access to the status of all your reviews. Once you have accepted an invitation, you will be able to proceed with the review creation process and ultimately submit your evaluation. This entire workflow can be efficiently managed from this central location.
segment.target: From here you will have access to the status of all your reviews. Once you have accepted an invitation, you will be able to proceed with the review creation process and ultimately submit your evaluation. This entire workflow can be efficiently managed from this central location.

segment.source: This review don't have any extra file
segment.target: This review don't have any extra file

segment.source: Upload your review. Preview your work and validate it before sending it.
segment.target: Upload your review. Preview your work and validate it before sending it.

segment.source: We will check the content, format and metadata of your review.
segment.target: We will check the content, format and metadata of your review.

segment.source: Now your review is published and will provide with helpful feedback.
segment.target: Now your review is published and will provide with helpful feedback.

segment.source: There is a newer version for this publication.
segment.target: There is a newer version for this publication.

segment.source: Preview automatically generated from the review file.
segment.target: Preview automatically generated from the review file.

segment.source: Everyone can see the reviewer identity
segment.target: Everyone can see the reviewer identity

segment.source: The author can see the reviewer identity
segment.target: The author can see the reviewer identity

segment.source: Only editors can see the reviewer identity
segment.target: Only editors can see the reviewer identity

segment.source: Everyone can see the review and the report
segment.target: Everyone can see the review and the report

segment.source: The author can see the review and the report
segment.target: The author can see the review and the report

segment.source: Only editors can see the review and the report
segment.target: Only editors can see the review and the report

segment.source: Remember to press the submit button when you finish your review to send it to the community editorial board.
segment.target: Remember to press the submit button when you finish your review to send it to the community editorial board.

segment.source: Use the blockchain to access extra features such as proving of the ownership of your work and get rewards for the peer reviews you make.
segment.target: Use the blockchain to access extra features such as proving of the ownership of your work and get rewards for the peer reviews you make.

segment.source: Activate Blockchain functionality to use these features
segment.target: Activate Blockchain functionality to use these features

segment.source: Save the Ownership of your review storing your authorship in the blockchain
segment.target: Save the Ownership of your review storing your authorship in the blockchain
